title: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
OB: When a ServletRequestListener is defined and invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST rather than ASYNC.
EB: The DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch() should be ASYNC instead of REQUEST when a ServletRequestListener is defined and invoked.
SR: Ensure that the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is ASYNC instead of REQUEST when a ServletRequestListener is defined and invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().
